casebody.data:
Powell
v.
State of NC 260P16-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2017 Archie David Powell, Jr., for Powell, Archie David (Jr.) Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of November 2016 by Plaintiff for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of January 2017."
